General.Name: The National Co for Glass Industrie
General.Description: The National Company for Glass Industries produces and sells returnable and non-returnable glass bottles and float glass. The company operates through Riyadh Factory segment. It offers generic glass packaging for food and beverages; and plain bottle, jars, and custom products. It operates sand and gravel mines, including crushers. The National Company for Glass Industries was founded in 1990 and is based in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia.

2.Name: Mr. Mohammad Sulaiman Mohammad Al Harbi
2.Title: Member of Management Board
